TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 控件中的项的集合或指定给 的项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a control or assigned to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存储中显示的项控制或分配给。A stores the items displayed in a control or assigned to a . 有两个其他集合中定义使您能够确定哪些项目在中选择的类控件。There are two other collections defined within the class that enable you to determine what items are selected within a control. 类提供的属性和方法来确定哪些项目中选择控件，而类使您能够确定中的哪些索引的控件选择。The class provides properties and methods for determining what items are selected in a control, while the class enables you to determine what indexes within the of a control are selected. 除了选择集合类，也有两个类，可用于确定选中了哪些项 (时属性控件设置为`true`) 在此集合中。In addition to selection collection classes, there are also two classes that enable you to determine what items are checked (when the property of the control is set to `true`) within this collection. 有多种方式可向集合添加项。There are a number of ways to add items to the collection. 方法向集合中添加单个项。The method adds a single item to the collection. 若要添加到集合的数目的项，创建项的数组，并将其传递到方法。To add a number of items to the collection, you create an array of items and pass it to the method. 如果你想要将项插入集合中的特定位置，则可以使用方法。If you want to insert an item at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除项，你可以使用方法或方法如果你知道该项目在集合中的位置。To remove items, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the item is located in the collection. 方法使你能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有项方法一次都移除单个项。The method enables you to remove all items from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single item at a time. 除了用于添加和移除项，方法和属性还提供了在集合中查找项的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items in the collection. 方法使您能够确定某个项是否是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道项位于集合中，你可以使用方法来确定该项目集合中的位置。Once you know that the item is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将项添加到。The following code example demonstrates how to add items to a . 请注意，属性`ListView1`属于类型。Note that the property of `ListView1` is of type . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体对象名为`ListView1`和名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds an item to the collection of items.

summary.span: 用指定的文本创建一个项并将该项添加到集合中。

span.span: Creates an item with the specified text and adds it to the collection.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法来创建一个新将添加到控件。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to a control. 新的文本添加到该控件基于`text`参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 如果你想要为项指定一个图像，使用的版本接受图像索引作为参数的方法。If you want to specify an image for the item, use the version of the method that accepts an image index as a parameter. 如果你有一个现成你想要添加到集合，使用的版本方法接受作为其参数。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，对列表进行排序后的项目添加。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序列表，则可以使用方法插入一项插入位于特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要将一组项添加到单个操作中的控件，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果你想要使用方法将大量的项添加到控件，请使用和方法，以避免从重新绘制之前添加的所有项。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法将添加现有到集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 此版本的方法通常用于重复使用从其他项控件或如果将其添加到集合之前手动创建。This version of the method is typically used to reuse items from other controls or if the was created manually before adding it to the collection. 如果你想要创建一个新而不是使用现有项，使用其他版本的方法。If you want to create a new instead of using an existing item, use the other versions of the method. 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，对列表进行排序后的项目添加。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序列表，则可以使用方法插入一项插入位于特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要将一组项添加到单个操作中的控件，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果你想要使用方法将大量的项添加到控件，请使用和方法，以避免从重新绘制之前添加的所有项。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. 此版本的方法还用于分配到。This version of the method is also used to assign a to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法来创建一个新将添加到控件。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the control. 新的文本添加到该控件基于`text`参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 你还可以通过传递的索引指定项图像分配给和属性设置为`imageIndex`参数。You can also specify an image for the item by passing the index of the assigned to the and properties to the `imageIndex` parameter. (通常情况下，和属性使用相同的索引位置以显示相关的图像。)如果不希望指定一个项的图像索引，使用的版本只接受字符串作为参数的方法。(Typically, the and properties use the same index positions to display related images.) If you do not want to specify an image index for the item, use the version of the method that accepts only a string as a parameter. 如果你有一个现成你想要添加到集合，使用的版本方法接受作为其参数。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，对列表进行排序后的项目添加。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the item is added. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序列表，则可以使用方法插入一项插入位于特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert an item into the at a specific position. 若要将一组项添加到单个操作中的控件，使用方法。To add a set of items to the control in a single operation, use the method. 如果你想要使用方法将大量的项添加到控件，请使用和方法，以避免从重新绘制之前添加的所有项。If you want to use the method to add a large number of items to the control, use the and methods to prevent the from repainting until all items are added. 当将项添加到，它是第一次的项进行排序，然后添加新项更加高效。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法来重用来自不同控件。You can use this method to reuse items from a different control. 如果你想要添加单个，使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 你还可以使用方法如果你想要添加单个位于集合中特定位置。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. 你可以使用此方法来分配多个对象添加到。You can also use this method to assign multiple objects to a . 如果属性设置为值或如果属性设置，则在添加项后，对列表进行排序。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted after the items are added. 否则，在列表末尾插入项。Otherwise, the items are inserted at the end of the list. 如果未排序列表，则可以使用方法插入项复制到中的特定位置。If the list is not sorted, you can use the method to insert items into the at specific positions. ## Examples 下面的示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and called the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]
